page.title: 19FARMER'S WIFE cont'd
page.content: ...In the Threemilestone Methodist Church, Mrs. Trevethan also belongs to the Church Cowethas (lit. Cornish; 'meeting of ladies'). She often gives help at the Boskenneth centre for mentally handicapped people in Redruth. Mrs. Trevethan's hobbies are knitting, sewing, walking and interior decorating (at home). Her usual domestic shopping routine is a weekly drive into Truro for special shopping, but otherwise she collects 'essentials' from her local village Post-office, butcher and baker, in Threemilestone. As regards relaxing, you can see that Mrs. Trevethan is extremely busy! However, this April the Trevethan family had their first holiday for 10 years at a Methodist hotel in N.Wales.
